1.content:
Megaman was slowly wandering the halls of the Aensland castle. He had smashed a wooden coat rack to make a walking stick, to help him move while he still had on his casts. He was thankful that there was many nooks and crannys that he could hide in when he thought Lilith was passing by.

'It's gotta be here someplace. All those books and stories that Barrel had about vampire castles and demon castles having large libraries has to be true. They have to! And one of the books there will have a way home!' Megaman thought, as he continued to walk. Then he got a feeling to hide. After quickly looking around, he hid in an alcove behind a large suit of armor.

"Meggypoo! Where are you?" Lilith called out as she walked past. She then muttered to herself. "Now where is he? I could have sworn he came this way!"

Megaman heard the sound of Lilith stretching out her wings and then a slight 'woosh' noise that let Megaman know that Lilith was flying away. He then spent a few minutes in the alcove before carefully getting out and continuing to wander about the castle.
1.title: Not the start of the story, but of a chapter.

11.content:
Spotting a door that looked like a door to a library, Megaman went to it and tried to openit as best he could with one arm and two legs in medical casts.

'If I can, I'm going to bring the casts back, so that I can donate them to some research place. The fact they allow me a lot more movement than I expected is awesome!' Megaman thought as he opened the door.

Behind the door was not the Library that Megaman expected, but was a kitchen. A kitchen that had several cute girls as chefs. They all had grey-ish blue skin and a lot of stitches. Megaman had a feeling they were zombies or a variant of them

"Oh my! who are you, cutie-pie?" A red-haired zombie girl asked.

"I hope he's not someone that the Mistresses brought to feed on!" A blue haired zombie girl pouted.

"If he is, then let's have some fun with him first!" A yellow-haired Zombie girl cried out. The other two zombie girls stared at their yellow-haired counterpart for a few seconds.

"Agreed!" The trio called out. They looked at the door and...

saw that Megaman had run away.

"After him!" The red-haired zombie girl yelled as she lead the charge.

Megaman had hidden himself behind a wall-mounted tapestry. He waited until he no longer hear the zombie girls' footsteps.

He once again tried to find the library.
11.title: into the kitchen!

111.content:
Lilith was floating through the castle hallways, wondering where Megaman was.

Then her world went dark and she felt a pair of hands hugging her. Due to how soft the things around her head felt, Lilith realized that Morrigan was doing on of her usual things to make Lilith feel a bit humiliated about her body by hugging her in a marshmallow hell way.

"MRRPRH! MRRRH!" Lilith shouted as she tried to escape.

"What's wrong, little sister? Can't I give you a hug?" Morrigan asked as she then let Lilith go.

"Why do you do hug me like that!?" Lilith asked, as she crossed her arms to cover her breasts.

"It's not my fault we tend to age slowly..." Morrigan answered, as she covered her mouth as she chuckled.

"Well, stop it!" Lilith loudly demanded. She even stomped the ground a little.

"Oh, but you're simply too adorable!" Morrigan replied as she walked away.

"I'll get revenge.... Just you wait...." Lilith muttered as she flew into the air and tried to look for Megaman
111.title: Lilith and Morrigan chat....?

choices: Morrigan brainwashes MegaMan and turns him into her pet/servant/plaything
1111.content:
Risking peaking around from where he was hidden, the blue-armored teen sighed, no sign of Lilith...at least for now. That was good. Not that MegaMan didn't appreciate the help and affection she had been giving him since she had saved his life and nursed him back to health, but he HAD to get out of here! The fact that Lilith was so smitten with him that she was trying to keep him as hers didn't really mesh with that.

MegaMan looked back...only to have his face clash to a large pair of breasts! Suddenly the woman hugged him, squeezing his face to her breasts.

"Well, well. What have we here?" She said in a playfully seductive tone as she raised his face up, allowing him to breath again as she studied him.

She a full-grown woman that looked like she could have passed as a supermodel. Her apparel consisted of of a white airy blouse and a pair of close fitting pair of hip-huggers. She pushed aside a couple strands of hair and tucked it behind her ear. Her emerald eyes sparkled in a way that made him nervous. Her green hair flowed like a rich sea wave behind her head, and her leather bodice had a heart shaped cutout revealing her tummy. Her purple stockings... boots...

Wait, he recognized this woman. She was Morrigan Aensland...Lilith's older sister.

NOT GOOD!

If Lilith got him bothered while she was still learning how to mess with a guy's head, he didn't even want to THINK about what the one who more than likely taught her the finer points of it went!

Blushing furiously, The digger/purifier unit tried pulling away, to no effect. She was even stronger than she was beautiful...Gah! 'Bad thought, don't go there…!' MegaMan told himself as he flailed his arms up and down like a mad penguin.

"Aren't you just the cutest!" Morrigan laughed, seeing how embarrassed he was. So THIS was what her sister had kept trying to hide from her! Not that she had succeeded...Lilith's little invisibility spell was admittedly a low-level, more like refraction than actual invisibility. Easy for someone like her to see through.

Still...Morrigan could see why her little sister wouldn't want to share. This one was cute and REEKED of un-snatched innocence. It made Morrigan giddy. She licked her lips and gazed at him while he had so much blood rushing to his face that he was about to black out. But he still caught Morrigan's eyes with his own.

MegaMan felt he was being pulled in by an unknown force. He couldn't look away from Morrigan's eyes. And his mind started feeling hazy.

Morrigan released him and then softly blew in the tip of his nose, and he fell over like a statue that had been knocked over.
1111.title: Follow Meganman

choices: They meet Lilith. Morrigan makes Lilith cry.
11111.content:
Seeing that Megaman was in a solid trance, Morrigan bent down and straddled his hips, briefly rubbing her derriere against his groin.

With a wicked smile he bent forward until her face was inches away from his and her breasts were laying against his chest.

"Tell me your name, sweet thing..." Morrigan said, still using her succubus eye to further hypnotizing the blue digger.

"Megaman. Megaman Volnutt..." Megaman stated. His eyes briefly regained their normal state, as if remembering another time when he said those words.

"Megaman, I am Morrigan Aensland. Please tell me a little about yourself..." Morrigan said, as she rubbed the side of Megaman's head a little.

So he told her of Roll, Barrel, Tron, Teasel, and a few of the adventures he had. He told her of time he spent of Kattelox. He told her of the events leading up to how he had gotten stuck on the moon and how he had managed to leave it.

When he was done, Morrigan's smile gained a thoughtful look as her thoughts went something like 'It seems like trouble seeks you out, Megaman... I like it. Never a chance to get bored... But I should go with my first plan...'

"Well, Megaman... I guess fate's decided to reward you..." Morrigan said before she kissed him on the lips. She then stood up. "Let your new lover and master show you around..."

"Yes, Ms. Morrigan..." Megaman said as he stood up. His eyes were flat, but full of love for Morrigan. She walked right next to him and wrapped an arm around him. He did the same and then they walked off.
11111.title: Morrigan brainwashes MegaMan

choices: "Help me find him and don't tell my sister!"
"Cease your searching and stay in the kitchen!"
1112.content:
Lilith was flying through the air when she encountered the three cooks.

"Mistress Lilith!" The three cooks shouted when they saw an annoyed Lilith.

"What are you doing running around!?" Lilith shouted.

"We were searching for the mortal that you or the other mistress brought to the castle!" The red haired cook replied in a scared tone.

"Yeah! Then we were going to bring him to you or the other mistress!" The Blue haired cook said in an equally scared tone.

The Yellow haired cook could only stammer. Lilith had used her for target practice in the past a few too many times.

Lilith then took a few breaths before saying....
1112.title: Lilith and the three cooks

choices: Refused to answer and then continued to search for Megaman
11121.content:
"Help me find him and don't tell my sister!" Lilith ordered. She curled her hands into fists and then sweetly said, "If she discovers him.... I promise that I will make sure that you all will suffer..."

The Three cooks quickly nodded.

"Follow me," Lilith said, as she began floating down the hall that the Zombies had just left.

"But we came from there and already searched there!" The red haired cook pouted as she and her sisters followed after the purple-haired succubus.

"I can feel him somewhere in this direction!" Lilith said, glaring back at the three cooks.

"S-sorry! I bet you could find him far better than we could!" The blue haired cook nervously replied.

Lilith let out a proud huff as she looked ahead of herself, only to look far too late and hit a stone pillar.

"Are you alright, Mistress Lilith?" The Red Haired cook asked. Lilith then...
11121.title: Getting the help of the zombie cooks.

13.content:
Lilith had entered the kitchen where there were three cooks working at the moment. All three were female zombies and were sisters. Their skin was blue-ish grey and they all had quite a bit of stitches all over their bodies. Their clothing was a maid's uniform.

One was red-haired and her short hair was badly cut, like she had trimmed it herself with a knife. She had a bit of a psychotic gleam in her eye as she chopped some meat up.

The second had medium length blue hair and seemed like she was bored with everything. She was stirring a pot of soup, but had a hammer nearby if whatever was in the soup tried to leave it.

The third had long blonde hair, tied in ponytail. She seemed a bit too cheerful for a zombie and was humming a song that wouldn't be out of place in a kid's show. She currently was currently replacing the empty containers in the cupboards.

"So what brings you in, Mistress Lilith?" The Red haired cook asked as she watched Lilith walk around.

"Nothing much, Avers. Whatcha chopping up?" Lilith asked,

"A wild boar from Ivalice." Avers replied as she continued to chop.

"What soup is that, Muirgheal?" Lilith asked, as she skipped over to the Blue haired cook.

"Something that Mistress Morrigan asked me to make. She wanted something that could make whoever eats it have enough energy to fight an army," Muirgheal answered in a bored tone as she continued to stir.

"Is it safe for humans, Hypothetically, of course! It's not like I brought in a human or something," Lilith asked, hoping that she didn't reveal Megaman's presence.

"I assume so. Most of the ingredients have been proven to be safe for human digestion," Muirgheal replied.

"Ah! Then could I have some to go?" Lilith asked, trying to sound as cute as possible.

"Very well. The soup is done and I am just about to bring it to Morrigan. I am certain that she won't miss a little bit," Muirgheal answered, as she poured a little bit in a bowl for Lilith.

"Thanks!" Lilith said, as she grabbed the bowl and flew out.

"Mistress Lilith is easy to read, isn't she?" The blonde haired cook cheerfully asked the others.

"Yep! So, whatcha think she brought a human here for, Asphodel? Love, lust, or meal?" Avers asked.

"Hmmm..... I wanna say love, but since Mistress Lilith is Mistress Morrigan's sister, lust is also a possibility...." Asphodel muttered, getting depressed at the end.

"Should the human prove unsatisfying or extremely boring in their eyes, the human's soul may wind up as meal for them and their bodies sent here to be used as meat for the hellhounds," Muirgheal stated.

"So what is the name of the soup are you making?" Avers asked.

"kämpfen Rindsuppe." Muirgheal replied. Avers laughed.

"Wha?" Asphodel uttered, tilting her head cutely as she had a puzzled expression.

"It means, 'fighting beef soup'. However, the version the Mistress Morrigan likes to eat has a strong tendency to attack anything with a strong human scent. I think it has something to do with the spices or the enchanted cookware..."Avers replied.
13.title: Killer soup

132.content:
MegaMan looked at the girl before him. Was she hunting Jedah Dohma too?

Hsien-ko stood a scant 5'2" and weighed only 92 pounds (if he was guessing her weight right, he knew enough NOT to ask a lady about her weight, after all) with generous proportions that seem doubtful for a Chinese woman born in 1730. Her skin was a pale bluish color, almost a blue-gray. Her eyes were bright yellow, while her shoulder-length hair was an inky blue-black. Her outfit consisted of white socks, black slippers, loose blue trousers, a long-sleeved blue tunic with gold cuffs and a red, high-collared sleeveless overtunic with gold trim. The overtunic had a broad oval-cut out on the upper chest that displays a fair amount of cleavage. A wide gold sash/belt keep the overtunic in place. Hsien-ko also wore a red Mandarin-styled hat topped with a gold ball and trim.

Despite her odd coloration, she was quite attractive. MegaMan had to admit that.

Meanwhile, the Jiang Shi looked at the Nephilim as he folded his wings, the angelic, white-feathered wing coming from his right shoulder blade nor the black, bat-like one coming from his left shoulder blade. His eyes had a smoky pink sclera, eyelids rimmed with red, while the pupils and iris were both alabaster blue. She felt he was actually a little cute, truth be told. He was pretty short, only an inch or two taller than she was, and he couldn't have been much older---if he was older at all. He had a friendly face, his hair was brown, and hung atop his head in loose-fitting spikes and his lips were pursed in an adorable fashion, and the button nose was a nice touch. The dark purple, nearly black, bodysuit he was wearing did well to outline his slender figure. He had on orange-red tabi shoes made for Parkour and Freerunning, as well as orange-red gloves that had metal knuckles, both the shoes and gloves were made as part of the suit he was wearing. Furthermore, it was made with a pair of mandala comprised of nine reddish-brown circles of varying sizes atop a larger green-grey circle on each of his shoulder blades, clearly they were a type of seal that allowed his wings to grow or retract without damaging the outfit he was wearing.

He blinked.

She blinked.

He gave a small, shy, smile.

She grinned fully.

"Uh...hi." the Purifier unit said, while he was willing to give her the benefit of the doubt, he had been in Makai a while now...long enough for his slow transformation into a Nephilim simply by him staying in Makai over time. The energy the Makai world had effecting him after an extended time there.

"Nǐ hǎo!" Hsien-ko said brightly. "So YOU'RE the Nephilim that everybody's been talking about recently?"

MegaMan shrugged, causing his wings to flare a bit "...Guess so. Don't ask me how I turned into one though."

That made her blink a bit in surprise as she tilted her head to the side, so he was like her? A "Second born" as the term used here in Makai to describe a person who had been changed from what they originally were into a monster, demon, or spirit. Even to this day, Hsien-Ko remembered when she used the Igyo Tenshin technique to turn into a Jiang-Shi while Mei-Ling, her older sister, turned into a ward to make sure Hsien-Ko didn't lose control of herself.

She smiled a bit at him at that. He seemed honestly nice. Pretty cute too. Well, if anything, the Aensland succubus had good taste.

"You don't say? No wonder someone like you is so out of place here in the demon world. Makes me want to see if the things I've heard about you are true or not."

MegaMan scratched the back of his head, embarrassed.

"...Pity I might have to kill you."

"...HUH?!"
132.title: Another storyline

choices: being framed leads to Fight time!
1321.content:
Seeing Megaman's worried and confused expression, Hsien-ko sighed and shook her head.

"I am a dark hunter. I hunt and kill darkstalkers. Depending on how your choices in the future, you might very well become a target for me," Hsien-ko explained, while keeping on eye on his body movement. Megaman had the feeling that she was getting ready to possibly attack him or something.

"I'd ask why, but I've seen some nasty demons since I've been trapped here by Lilith..." Megaman muttered, looking away from Hsien-ko.

While the undead cutie saw that he was nervous, she didn't let down her guard. Some of her targets liked to play innocent to get in an attack, often the attempted surprise attack was directed at Mei-Ling for the purpose of replacing her with a specially-made ward-paper to make Hsien-ko their slave. those kinds of demons, often were torn apart. Violently and painfully.

In the shadows, unnoticed by Megaman and Hsien-ko, someone was lurking. They smiled as their plan for mischief and mayhem was just about to unfold. All it needed was a slight push.

(option 1 - the mystery being secretly placed a ward paper on Hsien-ko without anyone noticing. Now Hsien-ko temorarily is super-yandere for Megaman. That includes wanting to turn him into a jiāngshī like herself. So maybe she alternates between trying to kill him and trying to bed him)

(Option 2. the mystery being fires a shot towards Hsien-Ko and misses, while mimicking Lilith's voice saying, "Damn, we almost got her, Meggy-poo!" Hsien-Ko decides to kill Megaman, who is trying to proclaim his innocence while trying to find out who framed him)
1321.title: continue this storyline

choices: "Would you like to become a jiāngshī?"
13211.content:
The person in the shadows smiled as they quickly prepared a ward-paper out of the air.

'This will be ever so much fun...' The being thought as they put the final touches on the paper. Once they were done, they used their illusion ability to hide themselves as they snuck behind Hisen-ko and Megaman.

When a feeling of dread hit her, Hisen-ko looked around as she quickly took out a throwing knife.

"Hisen-Ko?" Megaman asked, pausing when the jiāngshī motioned for him to be quiet.

After a few moments, she put the knife away and seemed to relax.

"Nothing. I just thought I-Heh heheh!" Hisen-ko said before she giggled a little bit. She stood up and looked back. Both Megaman and her saw that it was a beetle that seemed to have tried to crawl up the back of her clothes and somehow reached her skin, which was no easy feat. "Nothing... like before..."

"Oh... Megaman uttered before looking down at the ground to think of something to say.

Unknown to the both of then, the being had placed their ward-paper on Hisen-ko's back. Because Megaman was looking down, he had no idea that Hisen-ko was looking at him differently.

'I wonder if I should make him into a jiāngshī like myself? Maybe I should, to prevent him from straying...' Hisen-ko thought with a low giggle. Another thought came to her. One naughty enough in nature that she licked her lips. 'I wonder if I should go with black lingerie or red for our wedding night?'

"Megaman?"Hisen-Ko cooed, making Megaman look up rather quickly. Putting a finger by her lips to look cute and sexy, Hisen-ko asked...
13211.title: Yandere Hsien-Ko

choices: an angry Lilith appears and accidentally removes Mei-Ling from Hisen-Ko
132111.content:
"Would you like to become a jiāngshī, Megaman?" Hisen-Ko asked.

Then the ward paper on Hisen-Ko's hat started to wave itself in front of her face

"Sister! You never asked that of anyone before!" Mei-Ling mentally asked.Hisen-Ko.

"He's a handsome man, sister, and I'm getting a bit lonely for certain types of company," Hisen-Ko replied.

"We aren't going to remain like this forever, sister! Don't do anything you'll regret later!" Mei-Ling quickly said back.

Hisen-Ko ignored that and used her hand to move the paper out of her eyes. During the time she had been distracted by Mei-Ling, Megaman had been moving away from Hisen-Ko.

"Uh... I kinda don't want to be a jiāngshī..." Megaman said, once he noticed that the Blue-skinned Darkstalker was staring at him once more.

"But Megaman, once you become a jiāngshī, you'd be able to live forever with me! We'd be able to do all sorts of thing together!" Hisen,Ko said as she grabbed and hugged his arm, putting it right in her bosom. She then leaned in closer and whispered in Megaman ear, "Especially the ero things..."

"Now I know something is off! We need to check your body to see if anything has been put onto you, sister!" MeI-Ling cried out to Hisen-Ko. Sadly, Hisen-Ko ignored her.

Megaman blushed, which Hisen-Ko found cute enough to comment on it. "You're adorable when you blush like that!"

'After all Morrigan and Lilith had done to me, you'd think I'd stop blushing in these situations!' Megaman thought.
132111.title: Get worried, Megaman!

choices: Lilith and Megaman fight Hisen-Ko, while Mei-ling tries to reason with her
Hisen easily knocks out Lilith in one move, forcing the others to run...
1321111.content:
When Hisen-Ko's eyes opened up real wide, Megaman grew worried.

"Get away from him! Soul Flash!" An all-too-familiar voice cried out in anger, just as a large fireball came out of the bushes, heading towards Hisen-Ko... and Megaman.

"Gah!" both Hisen-Ko and Megaman cried out as they pushed each other away from each other, narrowly avoiding the fireball.

Lilith dashed right out of the bushes and hit Hisen-Ko with an uppercut, crying out "Shining Blade!"

Hisen-Ko was knocked into a tree almost thirty feet away from the succubus.

Due to a mix of surprise and them not working together as one at the moment, Mei-Ling and Hisen-Ko were separated. Both Lilith and Megaman were surprised to see a woman that looked like a human version of Hisen-Ko appear right between Hisen-Ko and Lilith. The woman was dressed in clothes similar to Hisen-Ko, but with a yellow and red Motif, compared to Hisen-Ko's Red and blue motif.

The woman sat up and rubbed her head for a few moments before she opened her eyes in shock and horror. Before she could say or do anything, everyone's attention was directed aty Hisen-Ko when the jiāngshī started to darkly chuckle.

"Heh heh heh heh...Oh Megaman... I need to remove my rivals in love before I can get to making you a jiāngshī...." Hisen-Ko said as she stood up and held her arms forward. An odd smile was on her face, one that almost seemed like her mind was in a happy dream, but scared even Lilith with how... empty the smile seemed. "Maybe I can make them into jiāngshī as well... Servant girls are always useful..."
1321111.title: an angry Lilith makes it worse

1322.content:
Somewhere in Makai, in a demonic city, at a bar called Nyarly's Corner, thing were still as a grave. Normally, the bar's inhabitants could be heard blocks away. It was usually filled with Alcohol-fueled brawls that were broken up by the the bouncers, who then quickly got bored and restarted the brawls.

Instead, it was quiet. The Bar patrons were quietly drinking and looking down to avoid each other. Why was this happening, you ask?
It was because the bar had a new patron that night. She was a blonde-haired human girl, dressed like she was Little Red Riding Hood.
"More Ferasan Blood wine!" The girl said, as she slammed down her empty glass.

"Yes, Ms. Bulletta! It's on the house, like the rest!" A nervous green Oni server quickly cried out as they brought out another bottle and refilled her glass.

Baby Bonnie Hood smirked as the server backed away in fear. She slowly drank the contents of the glass, enjoying the frightened reactions of all those watching her more then the wine.

'They all fear me crying out that the wine was poor and then me killing them. They're only lucky that none of them have a bounty on their heads. Speaking of that, I need to find another bounty. Starting to get bored and my funds are running a bit lower then I want them to.' B.B. Hood thought to herself. 'I wonder why the Ferasan blood wine only makes demons drunk, but not humans? Ah well, Not my place to figure it out.'

At that moment, a pair of newbie bounty hunters wandered into the bar and sat down at near the bartender. One was a blue Oni and the other was a red Oni.

"I tell you, it's an easy mark! Dimitri is paying large amounts of gold to get rid of Lilith and Morrigan's new boytoy! " The red oni bounty hunter muttered, as he waved around a paper.

B.B. Hood's sharp eyes identified the paper as a bounty notice

"I dunno... For that amount, it seems like we'd be setting off a power struggle that will kill us sooner or later," The Blue Oni replied.

"Excuse me, sirs. But could I see that paper?" A cute voice asked from behind the two hunters.

The two hunters turned around, expecting to see some lowly goblin. When they saw an innocently smiling B.B. Hood with her hands clasped together, standing right behind them, The hunters did all they could to avoid pissing themselves.

"P-p-p-please ex-ex-ex-excuse my faulty memory, bu-bu-bu-but what did you ask for?" The Blue Oni asked.

B.B. Hood's smiled turned less innocent, and lowered her hands. A small whine was muttered by a few bar patrons throughout the bar when B.B. Hood started reaching for her basket.

"The paper. Give it to me," B.B. Hood replied in a low and dangerous tone.

Seeing his friend paralyzed with fear, The Blue oni nabbed the paper from the Red Oni's hands and handed it to B.B. Hood.
"Thanks!" B.B. Hood cheerfully replied as she then left the bar.

"Well, we're alive. But I think we should avoid that bounty," The Blue Oni said to his friend. The Red Oni nodded before breaking down and crying out of relief.

Outside the Bar,B.B. Hood was looking at the contents on the Bounty notice.

"Huh... Goes by the name of MegaMan.... Doesn't seem all that threatening, but same could be said for me...." B.B. Hood muttered. She then looked at the amount of reward. "Yowsa! Vamp-boy wants him dead!"

After putting away the notice in her basket, B.B. Hood smirked as she headed to Aensland Castle.
1322.title: Red-hooded Bounty Hunter

choices: B.B.Hood sits down and offers some food. (laced with sleeping potion)
13221.content:
Megaman once again was trying to escape Aensland Castle, though he was coming closer and closer that it was a bad idea, since every time he tried, he kept meeting either youkai that wanted to eat him or youkai that thought he would be a good mate.

He wasn't sure which was the worse one.

He paused when he heard a young girl singing a peaceful song.

"Whose out there?" Megaman called out.

"Hn? Who are you?" A young girl called out.

"I'm Megaman Volnutt. who are you?" Megaman answered as he began to back away until he hit a tree. He then partially hit behind it.

"I'm Baby Bonnie Hood. I've been wanderign around, trying to find the way to my Granmother. The area has changed a lot and I'm starting to think I'm really lost..." The young girl's voice answered, sounding a bit sad and scared at the same time. It made Megaman feel guilty enough that he stepped away from the tree.

"Wherever you are, I'm here and will try to help you. Just follow the sound of my voice..." Megaman called out. A few seconds later, a young girl appeared. Megaman thought to himself, 'She looks like Roll cosplaying as Little Red Riding Hood...'

Megaman walked over to a nearby log and sat down on it. He patted the log and said, "Let's sit down and chat. Maybe we can figure out a way for us both to go back home?"
13221.title: B.B.Hood and Megaman - let's meet

choices: In a expensive dining room, tied to a chair.
still in the forest, with his head in B.B.Hood's lap.
132211.content:
The experience from various digs gave him an instinctive urge to fall to his side, narrowly avoiding a barrage from an Uzi that B.B.Hood pulled out from under her red dress.

"Lucky dodge! Let's see if you can keep it up!" B.B.Hood cried out as she quickly replaced the uzi's magazine before aiming it at Megaman and firing again.

Not wanting to test his new skin against bullets, Megaman rolled backwards to fall behind the log and out of B.B.Hood's sight. Somehow, the log was thick enough to take the Uzi's fire.

"Fire in the hole!" B.B.Hood cried out, making Megaman get up and run back towards Aensland castle. He was quickly knocked off his feet by B.B.Hood's grenade exploding.

Instead of getting up to walk, Megaman began to crawl forward at a rapid pace to hide behind a tree, narrowly avoiding more gunfire.

"Peh! You're boring me, blue boy!" B.B.Hood loudly said when Megaman hid behind a tree. B.B.Hood's respond was to put away her uzi and throw a molotov cocktail to create a field of fire to either block off an escape route or to force her target back into her sight.

She wickedly smiled when Megaman leapt into sight. She pulled out a gun and fired it. To both B.B.Hood and Megaman's surprise, it was a tranquilizer gun. B.B.Hood shrugged for a moment before she started to walk up to the increasingly drowzy Megaman as she put away the Tranquilizer gun and brought out her Uzi.

"Any last words before I riddle your body will bullets and cut off your head?" B.B.Hood asked.

Barely remembering the explanation of how Morrigan was able to seduce him into begin her servant with only her eyes, Megaman willed all the available Youkai energy he had into his eyes and unleashed it into onto B.B.Hood's eyes, thinking of the command 'love me'.

Just as he passed out from the Tranquilizer, he saw that B.B.Hood's gaze of greed, bloodlust, and hate was transforming into an impossible amount of love.

---

Some time later, Megaman woke up...
132211.title: B.B.Hood attacks Megaman

choices: B.B. Hood began to flirt with Megaman.
Morrigan brings Tron and Roll into Makai and teams them up with Lilith.
1322112.content:
As Megaman's eyes fluttered open. he saw a welcome sight.

Roll and she was gently smiling at him. Behind her was a blurry mess of darkness and greenery.

"Glad to see you're awake, Megaman. You started to worry me," Roll said, briefly closing her eyes.

"I had such a weird dream... you probably wouldn't believe me if I told you," Megaman said as his vision began to clear up. He enjoyed having his head on Roll's lap.

"Try me. You might be surprised," Roll retorted, still smiling at him. She then opened her eyes. There was a slightly sinsiter glint to them now.

"Well, I was kidnapped by a... a..." Megaman muttered as he closed his eyes to think how to explain. "Well, a succubus. She had an older sister or something. The two of them seemed to use me like a pawn in some game between them. Although my kidnapper seemed to love me.."

"Not as much as me, Megaman," B. B. Hood's voice said. Megaman's eyes quickly opened and he saw a horrifying sight.

Instead of his head on Roll's lap, his head was resting on B.B. Hood's lap! He tried to get up, but B.B. Hood put her hand on Megaman's chest. Due to him still being a bit weak from his recovery, B.B. Hood was able to hold him down.
1322112.title: still in the forest, with his head in B.B.Hood&...
